summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing charges for express shipping services. It includes information about the shipment, sender, and recipient, along with the total amount due. The invoice highlights transportation charges and a fuel surcharge, with a due date for payment.

persons.name: Jeffery Schantz
persons.context: Jeffery Schantz is identified as the sender of the package in the FedEx shipment details.

persons.name: Ed Spector
persons.context: Ed Spector is mentioned as the recipient of the package in the FedEx shipment details.

connections.description: Jeffery Schantz is the sender of the package, while Ed Spector is the recipient.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: The package was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

locations: 2 World Financial Center, New York, NY 10291
keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-581-64380, dated February 28, 2003.
Total charges for the shipment amount to $11.28.
The package was picked up on February 18, 2003.
A fuel surcharge of $0.43 was applied to the shipment.
The payment is due by March 15, 2003.
